column5: Had a few days at a cottage south of North Bay and was able to land a nice number of topwater smallmouth. My son is a solid angler for 13 while my daughter is a more typical 10 year old so any fish she catches is a big deal for me and her. Besides my daughter’s fish which were caught on a whopper plopper style lure most of mine and my son’s fish were on various walk-the-dog style lures with a few poppers or crazy crawlers in the mix.
What bass,all I see is pipes. Nice Rob.
nice fish! I have a 13 year old and we use his arms as pipe cleaners
Ya, he uses his to clean out our fridge.
Looks like a big lake. What lake is it?
